verses.verse: וַיַּ֤עַן <WH6030> vai-Ya-'an answered מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses וַיֹּ֔אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer, and said וְהֵן֙ <WH2005> ve-Hen if לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- they will not יַאֲמִ֣ינוּ <WH539> ya-'a-Mi-nu But behold they will not believe לִ֔י Li, וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo or יִשְׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> yish-me-'U me nor hearken בְּקֹלִ֑י <WH6963> be-ko-Li; unto my voice כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for יֹֽאמְר֔וּ <WH559> yo-me-Ru, for they will say לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- has not נִרְאָ֥ה <WH7200> nir-'Ah hath not appeared אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha about יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. The LORD

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said אֵלָ֛יו <WH413> 'e-Lav about יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD; מַזֶּה maz-zeh כמַה־ mah- זֶּ֣ה <WH2088> zeh he קבְיָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> ve-ya-De-cha; able וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said מַטֶּֽה׃ <WH4294> mat-Teh. A rod

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said הַשְׁלִיכֵ֣הוּ <WH7993> hash-li-Che-hu Cast אַ֔רְצָה <WH776> 'Ar-tzah, it on the ground וַיַּשְׁלִיכֵ֥הוּ <WH7993> vai-yash-li-Che-hu And he cast אַ֖רְצָה <WH776> 'Ar-tzah it on the ground וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> vay-Hi became לְנָחָ֑שׁ <WH5175> le-na-Chash; and it became a serpent וַיָּ֥נָס <WH5127> vai-Ya-nos fled מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh and Moses מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> mip-pa-Nav. from before

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, unto Moses שְׁלַח֙ <WH7971> she-Lach Put forth יָֽדְךָ֔ <WH3027> ya-de-Cha, thine hand וֶאֱחֹ֖ז <WH270> ve-'e-Choz and take בִּזְנָב֑וֹ <WH2180> biz-na-Vo; it by the tail וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> vai-yish-Lach And he put forth יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> ya-Do his hand וַיַּ֣חֲזֶק <WH2388> vai-Ya-cha-zek and caught בּ֔וֹ bo, וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi became לְמַטֶּ֖ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh it and it became a rod בְּכַפּֽוֹ׃ <WH3709> be-chap-Po. in his hand

לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an because of יַאֲמִ֔ינוּ <WH539> ya-'a-Mi-nu, That they may believe כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for נִרְאָ֥ה <WH7200> nir-'Ah hath appeared אֵלֶ֛יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha about יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh that the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> 'a-vo-Tam; of their fathers אֱלֹהֵ֧י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei the God אַבְרָהָ֛ם <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham of Abraham אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei the God יִצְחָ֖ק <WH3327> yitz-Chak of Isaac וֵאלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> ve-lo-Hei and the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko. of Jacob

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> vai-yo-Mer said יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD ל֜וֹ lo ע֗וֹד <WH5750> od, furthermore הָֽבֵא־ <WH935> ha-ve- unto him Put נָ֤א <WH4994> na Now יָֽדְךָ֙ <WH3027> ya-de-Cha now thine hand בְּחֵיקֶ֔ךָ <WH2436> be-chei-Ke-cha, into thy bosom וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> vai-ya-Ve And he put יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do his hand בְּחֵיק֑וֹ <WH2436> be-chei-Ko; into his bosom וַיּ֣וֹצִאָ֔הּ <WH3318> vai-Yo-tzi-'Ah, and when he took וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh behold יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do it out behold his hand מְצֹרַ֥עַת <WH6879> me-tzo-Ra-'at [was] leprous כַּשָּֽׁלֶג׃ <WH7950> kash-Sha-leg. as snow

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer, And he said הָשֵׁ֤ב <WH7725> ha-Shev again יָֽדְךָ֙ <WH3027> ya-de-Cha thine hand אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into חֵיקֶ֔ךָ <WH2436> chei-Ke-cha, into thy bosom וַיָּ֥שֶׁב <WH7725> vai-Ya-shev again יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do his hand אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into חֵיק֑וֹ <WH2436> chei-Ko; into his bosom וַיּֽוֹצִאָהּ֙ <WH3318> vai-yo-tzi-'Ah and plucked מֵֽחֵיק֔וֹ <WH2436> me-chei-Ko, it out of his bosom וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> ve-hin-neh- behold שָׁ֖בָה <WH7725> Sha-vah and behold it was turned again כִּבְשָׂרֽוֹ׃ <WH1320> kiv-sa-Ro. as his [other] flesh

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo they will not יַאֲמִ֣ינוּ <WH539> ya-'a-Mi-nu And it shall come to pass if they will not believe לָ֔ךְ Lach, וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo or יִשְׁמְע֔וּ <WH8085> yish-me-'U, thee neither hearken לְקֹ֖ל <WH6963> le-Kol to the voice הָאֹ֣ת <WH226> ha-'Ot sign הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <WH7223> ha-ri-Shon; of the first וְהֶֽאֱמִ֔ינוּ <WH539> ve-he-'e-Mi-nu, that they will believe לְקֹ֖ל <WH6963> le-Kol the voice הָאֹ֥ת <WH226> ha-'Ot sign הָאַחֲרֽוֹן׃ <WH314> ha-'a-cha-Ron. of the latter

וְהָיָ֡ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah will become אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo they will not יַאֲמִ֡ינוּ <WH539> ya-'a-Mi-nu And it shall come to pass if they will not believe גַּם֩ <WH1571> gam even לִשְׁנֵ֨י <WH8147> lish-Nei also these two הָאֹת֜וֹת <WH226> ha-'o-Tot signs הָאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh, these וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> ve-Lo or יִשְׁמְעוּן֙ <WH8085> yish-me-'Un neither hearken לְקֹלֶ֔ךָ <WH6963> le-ko-Le-cha, unto thy voice וְלָקַחְתָּ֙ <WH3947> ve-la-kach-Ta that thou shalt take מִמֵּימֵ֣י <WH4325> mi-mei-Mei of the water הַיְאֹ֔ר <WH2975> hay-'Or, of the river וְשָׁפַכְתָּ֖ <WH8210> ve-sha-fach-Ta and pour הַיַּבָּשָׁ֑ה <WH3004> hai-yab-ba-Shah; [it] upon the dry וְהָי֤וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu will become הַמַּ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> ham-Ma-yim [land] and the water אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which תִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> tik-Kach which thou takest מִן־ <WH4480> min- some הַיְאֹ֔ר <WH2975> hay-'Or, out of the river וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu will become לְדָ֖ם <WH1818> le-Dam shall become blood בַּיַּבָּֽשֶׁת׃ <WH3006> bai-yab-Ba-shet. upon the dry

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD בִּ֣י <WH994> bi O אֲדֹנָי֒ <WH136> 'a-do-Nai my Lord לֹא֩ <WH3808> lo have never אִ֨ישׁ <WH582> 'ish not דְּבָרִ֜ים <WH1697> de-va-Rim [am] not eloquent אָנֹ֗כִי <WH595> 'a-No-chi, I גַּ֤ם <WH1571> gam neither מִתְּמוֹל֙ <WH8543> mit-te-mOl before גַּ֣ם <WH1571> gam nor מִשִּׁלְשֹׁ֔ם <WH8032> mish-shil-Shom, time גַּ֛ם <WH1571> gam nor מֵאָ֥ז <WH227> me-'Az nor since דַּבֶּרְךָ <WH1696> dab-ber-cha thou hast spoken אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> 'av-De-cha; unto thy servant כִּ֧י <WH3588> ki for כְבַד־ <WH3515> che-vad- but I [am] slow פֶּ֛ה <WH6310> peh of speech וּכְבַ֥ד <WH3515> u-che-Vad and of a slow לָשׁ֖וֹן <WH3956> la-Shon tongue אָנֹֽכִי׃ <WH595> 'a-No-chi. I

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, to him מִ֣י <WH4310> mi Who שָׂ֣ם <WH7760> sam unto him Who hath made פֶּה֮ <WH6310> peh according לָֽאָדָם֒ <WH120> la-'a-Dam man's א֚וֹ <WH176> o or מִֽי־ <WH4310> mi- who יָשׂ֣וּם <WH7760> ya-Sum makes אִלֵּ֔ם <WH483> 'il-Lem, the dumb א֣וֹ <WH176> o or חֵרֵ֔שׁ <WH2795> che-Resh, or deaf א֥וֹ <WH176> o or פִקֵּ֖חַ <WH6493> fik-Ke-ach or the seeing א֣וֹ <WH176> o or עִוֵּ֑ר <WH5787> 'iv-Ver; blind men הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> ha-Lo not אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

וְעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah Now לֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> Lech; go וְאָנֹכִי֙ <WH595> ve-'a-no-Chi I אֶֽהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> 'eh-Yeh become עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- will be with פִּ֔יךָ <WH6310> Pi-cha, and I will be with thy mouth וְהוֹרֵיתִ֖יךָ <WH3384> ve-ho-rei-Ti-cha and teach אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher what תְּדַבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> te-dab-Ber. thee what thou shalt say

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said בִּ֣י <WH994> bi O אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai; my Lord שְֽׁלַֽח־ <WH7971> she-lach- send נָ֖א <WH4994> na now בְּיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- I pray thee by the hand תִּשְׁלָֽח׃ <WH7971> tish-Lach. [of him whom] thou wilt send

וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> vai-yi-char- was kindled אַ֨ף <WH639> 'af And the anger יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD בְּמֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> be-mo-Sheh, against Moses וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and he said הֲלֹ֨א <WH3808> ha-Lo not אַהֲרֹ֤ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron [Is] not Aaron אָחִ֙יךָ֙ <WH251> 'a-Chi-cha your brother הַלֵּוִ֔י <WH3881> hal-le-Vi, the Levite יָדַ֕עְתִּי <WH3045> ya-Da'-ti acknowledge כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for דַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> dab-Ber that he can speak יְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> ye-dab-Ber well ה֑וּא <WH1931> Hu; he וְגַ֤ם <WH1571> ve-Gam and moreover הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> hin-neh- behold הוּא֙ <WH1931> hu he יֹצֵ֣א <WH3318> yo-Tze And also behold he cometh forth לִקְרָאתֶ֔ךָ <WH7125> lik-ra-Te-cha, to meet וְרָאֲךָ֖ <WH7200> ve-ra-'a-Cha thee and when he seeth וְשָׂמַ֥ח <WH8056> ve-sa-Mach glad בְּלִבּֽוֹ׃ <WH3820> be-lib-Bo. in his heart

וְדִבַּרְתָּ֣ <WH1696> ve-dib-bar-Ta And thou shalt speak אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, to him וְשַׂמְתָּ֥ <WH7760> ve-sam-Ta unto him and put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim words בְּפִ֑יו <WH6310> be-Fiv; in his mouth וְאָנֹכִ֗י <WH595> ve-'a-no-Chi, I אֶֽהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> 'eh-Yeh become עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- will be with פִּ֙יךָ֙ <WH6310> pi-cha and I will be with thy mouth וְעִם־ <WH5973> ve-'im- with פִּ֔יהוּ <WH6310> Pi-hu, and with his mouth וְהוֹרֵיתִ֣י <WH3384> ve-ho-rei-Ti and will teach אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> 'et-Chem, אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher what תַּעֲשֽׂוּן׃ <WH6213> ta-'a-Sun. you what ye shall do

וְדִבֶּר־ <WH1696> ve-dib-ber- And he shall be thy spokesman ה֥וּא <WH1931> hu he לְךָ֖ le-Cha אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- for הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> ha-'Am; unto the people וְהָ֤יָה <WH1961> ve-Ha-yah become הוּא֙ <WH1931> hu he יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> yih-yeh- become לְּךָ֣ le-Cha לְפֶ֔ה <WH6310> le-Peh, and he shall be [even] he shall be to thee instead of a mouth וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah you תִּֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> tih-yeh- become לּ֥וֹ lo לֵֽאלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> Le-lo-Him. and thou shalt be to him instead of God

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַמַּטֶּ֥ה <WH4294> ham-mat-Teh this rod הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh this תִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> tik-Kach And thou shalt take בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> be-ya-De-cha; in thine hand אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> ta-'a-seh- wherewith thou shalt do בּ֖וֹ bo אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאֹתֹֽת׃ <WH226> ha-'o-Tot. signs פ Peh

וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech departed מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses וַיָּ֣שָׁב׀ <WH7725> vai-Ya-shov and returned אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- and יֶ֣תֶר <WH3503> Ye-ter And Jethro חֹֽתְנ֗וֹ <WH2859> cho-te-No, his father in law וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said לוֹ֙ lo אֵ֣לְכָה <WH1980> 'E-le-chah go נָּ֗א <WH4994> Na, Please וְאָשׁ֙וּבָה֙ <WH7725> ve-'a-Shu-vah I pray thee and return אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אַחַ֣י <WH251> 'a-Chai unto my brethren אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> be-mitz-Ra-yim, which [are] in Egypt וְאֶרְאֶ֖ה <WH7200> ve-'er-'Eh and see הַעוֹדָ֣ם <WH5750> ha-'o-Dam whether they be yet חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> chai-Yim; alive וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יִתְר֛וֹ <WH3503> yit-Ro and Jethro לְמֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> le-mo-Sheh to Moses לֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> lech Go לְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> le-sha-Lom. in peace
